results.title: So You Want to Be a Unicorn Farmer: 5 Things You Need to Know Before Entering the Best Occupation Ever | Quirk Books : Publishers & Seekers of All Things Awesome
results.description: These 5 pointers should help get you set for a long and industrious career in unicorn farming. For more information on this lucrative occupation, check out my book, Raising Unicorns: Your Step-by-Step Guide to Starting and Running a Successful – and Magical! – Unicorn Farm (Adams Media, 2011).
extra_snippets: Photo by Rob Boudon These days, it seems everyone is looking to break into the unicorn farming industry. Be it the economy, the limited opportunities in the classifieds, or the undeniable allure of ‘80s nostalgia, new batches of unicorn farmers are sprouting up across the globe.

For more information on this lucrative occupation, check out my book, Raising Unicorns: Your Step-by-Step Guide to Starting and Running a Successful – and Magical! – Unicorn Farm (Adams Media, 2011). Sparkle on, unicorn farmers in training! Jessica S. Marquis is a self-proclaimed Unicornomicist and a freelance writer who produces offbeat, satirical humor. Her work has appeared in Geek Monthly, Redbook, Flash, and Going Bonkers? She lives, writes, creates films, and raises unicorns in Phoenix, AZ with her husband and their colleague Farmer McGlitter.

There is the picturesque Purebred, the glitterific Twinkletoe, the fiery Karmic, and the awkwardly lovable Gigglerump. Mixing them up will create a ton of grief that – trust me – you do not have time for, especially as you are growing your unicorn farming business.

So showing up the day you open your unicorn farm, expecting awesomeness to greet you at the ribbon-cutting ceremony, won’t cut it – ribbon-wise or occupationally. Take careful and honest assessment of your Awesomeness Factor (the A-Factor) before embarking on this magical adventure.

results.description: Unicorns are a type of animal featured in Farm Together. They are unlocked by completing a task during the Lovely Harvest. extra_snippets: Unicorns are a type of animal featured in Farm Together. They are unlocked by completing a task during the Lovely Harvest. Unlike other animals, there is a limit to how many unicorns a player can have on their farm (18). Unicorn is an animal unlocked at farm level 7. Each plot of unicorn costs 2.00K coins to plant, giving you 4 experience, it takes 2 hours to grow, giving a player and 20 experience points when harvested.

Default, watery and steep terrains give the same amount amount of coins, while a flat map farm is considered to be hard mode therefore decreasing the profit by 20% compared to the standard farms. Unicorn is an animal unlocked at farm level 7. Each plot of unicorn costs 2.00K coins to plant, giving you 4 experience, it takes 2 hours to grow, giving a player and 20 experience points when harvested. At animal level 1 unicorn can be harvested for 2 diamonds.

At animal level 1 unicorn can be harvested for 2 diamonds. The profit can be increased by levelling up the animal. Animal profits also depend on the farm layout a player chooses at the beginning of the game. Default, watery and steep terrains give the same amount amount of coins, while a flat map farm is considered to be hard mode therefore decreasing the profit by 20% compared to the standard farms.
